channel.title: 3 questions
channel.description:
Ok. Hi.
I have 2 Questions
1. I have tried to create a server using testscape.
and it is wierd that the server ip is : 0.0.0.0 why is it that.
Question 2. Can i change the ip so that people can play on it... Thanks
3. Can people play on it?

item.title: 3 questions
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

Hmmmp piece of crap. I try to register on the serverstatus page and it says it is offline
Why?

Read full topic

item.title: 3 questions
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“ikick221, post:1, topic:39815”]Ok. Hi.

I have 2 Questions

  1. I have tried to create a server using testscape.

and it is wierd that the server ip is : 0.0.0.0
why is it that.

Question 2. Can i change the ip so that people can play on it… Thanks

  1. Can people play on it?[/quote]

All questions can be answered at once. It shows 0.0.0.0 because it is dum. You can still log on as 127.0.0.1. About other people logging on, they need to connect to your external IP address which can be found here. You may want to make sure your router has port 43594 forwarded, if you have a router.

Read full topic
